name: Psychic Showdown
description:
Do you have psychic powers? In the 1980s, a Princeton University experiment proved the existence of psychic abilities in test subjects. Psychic Showdown is a recreation of this experiment.

Focus your mind to guide the game pieces. Develop your abilities and challenge psychics all over the world with online play.

"You'll be lifting cars with your mind in no time." - Free Apps Arcade

Join millions of Showdown gamers worldwide and find out why apps like Shooting Showdown and Soccer Showdown have lit up the top charts and been featured by everyone from Apple to IGN, AppAdvice, and TouchArcade.

FEATURING:
✔ Stunning graphics with iPhone 5 and new iPad Retina support
✔ Unlockable game pieces to show off your psychic abilities
✔ Unique trophies and bonuses for completing achievements
✔ Psychic abilities meter to track your progress

A technical note: this app functions identically to the renowned experiment. Once the game piece is dropped, it is completely released into a physical world.
